{"id":1205822958,"question_id":3353,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"2 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1710642805,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1205822958/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Existence of a Substring in a String and Its Reverse","memory":"43.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean isSubstringPresent(String s) {\n        \n        Set<String> set = new HashSet<>();\n        int len = s.length();\n        for(int i=0;i<len-1 ;i++){\n            set.add(s.substring(i, i+2));\n        }\n        \n        String rev = new StringBuilder(s).reverse().toString();\n        \n        for(String sub  : set){\n            if(rev.contains(sub))\n                return true;\n        }\n        \n        return false;\n        \n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"existence-of-a-substring-in-a-string-and-its-reverse","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
